page.title: 06Childrens Games
page.content: These are some of the games that children in our Primary school playground. SKIPPING GAMES :-'Unders and Overs' is very poular, the rope is turned and you have to jump over and run out before being caught. You then turn round and run under the rope. SITTING GAMES :- 'Chinese Whispers' for examlpe is when you sit in a circle and pass a message in the ear of the person next to you. The idea is to see if the message is exactly the same by the time it gets to the last person. RUNNING GAMES :- 'Off Ground Touch' is a game where one person is 'on it' and the rest run round the playgrond without being 'had'. You cannot be caught if your feet are off the ground.
